name: The green leggings of Greenlight
data: It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has tiny armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'vocal training'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'tonal projection'.
It reduces the strain on your singing voice.
